alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Orange and north central Osceola Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Austin Tindall Park, or near East Lake Toho, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Saint Cloud, Wedgefield, Orlando International Airport, and East Lake Toho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
